name: Fast Escape Duo
description:
Game made for the 2022 Global Game Jam

HOW TO PLAY

Use W,A,S,D to move the Orange Character

Use the Arrows to move the Purple Character

Use SPACE to Swap characters

Press R to reset The level

ART

Animated Pixel Rogue by cyberrumor (itch.io)

Retro Space! Sci-Fi Tileset by PetricakeGames (itch.io)

Sprout Lands - Asset Pack by Cup Nooble (itch.io)

SOUND

Freesound - "Bird Sanctuary NJ (loop)" by hargissssound

Freesound - "Cop Action - Action Cinematic Music.wav" by szegvari
